summary: Provides evidence of manipulation and investment funding from the U.S. government to carry out the Brazilian military coup that occurred in 1964.
cast: Auro de Moura Andrade|Robert Bentley|Júlio de Sá Bierrenbach|Humberto de Alencar Castelo Branco|Newton Cruz|Bocayuva Cunha|Arthur da Costa e Silva|Carlos Fico|Lincoln Gordon|João Goulart|James Naylor Green|Lyndon B. Johnson|John F. Kennedy|Peter Kornbluh|Stanley Howard Lehman|Edson Mazieiro|Jarbas Passarinho|Plinio de Arruda Sampaio|Eric Sevareid|Dean Rusk|Vernon Walters
keywords: brazilian military dictatorship|latin american politics|military dictatorship|brazil united states relation|brazil
title: El Día que Duró 21 años
